message: Let's start fair. I'll take 99% and you get 1%. This is a good start, but let's talk!
Meet me halfway. No need for extreme offers at the start.
Okay, I understand you're aiming for a more even split. But I still believe I deserve the majority, considering the inflation factor. I'm offering 90/10. Let's see if we can reach a compromise.
I'm willing to compromise, but I think 70/30 is a fairer split, considering the inflation factor is affecting you more.
I'm willing to come down to 80/20. Remember, the inflation is hitting me hard.  Let's find a solution before we both lose more money!
I'm starting to think we're getting close to the deadline. I'm willing to give you a bit more, but 60/40 is the maximum I'm willing to go.
Okay, I'm starting to feel the pressure too. This is my final offer - 70/30.  If we don't agree, we risk losing it all!
